name: Arts & Creative Expression
description: Vocabulary for visual arts, music, literature, and creative pursuits.
context: arts, creativity, music, literature, and artistic expression

words.meaning: concerned with beauty or appreciation of beauty
the arrangement of elements in a work of art
the technique of representing three-dimensional objects on a two-dimensional surface
the art of making three-dimensional forms
a drawing or picture that explains or decorates
a sequence of musical tones forming the main part of a song
the combination of simultaneously sounded musical notes
a strong, regular, repeated pattern of movement or sound
the process of being mentally stimulated to create
the faculty of forming new ideas or images
a public display of works of art
a collection of an artist's work
a work of outstanding artistry or skill
a detailed analysis and assessment of artistic work
a category of artistic composition characterized by style or content
